column4: i just rm -rf a directory. which is the best tool, i can use to recover the directory. Please advise. will any tool be effective in case i havent deleted any file after that operation?
the only thing i know to do is run dd and try to specify a delete portion
not so much if you rm -rf'd it. There are data recovery tools such as dd and photorec
these programs read the bits directly off of a drive, and can recover some files
